hero.title: El Sayed El Nashar Carpentry Works
hero.subtitle: Long experience in all carpentry and custom furniture works. We provide professional services with high quality, affordable prices, fast execution, and precise details.

about.title: About Us
about.content: At El Sayed El Nashar, we provide the best carpentry services in Sharjah, Dubai, and Ajman. We specialize in custom furniture, installation, maintenance, kitchens, doors, and bedrooms. We deliver complete carpentry solutions for homes, offices, and shops with high quality, fast service, and competitive prices.

services.title: Our Services
services.cta: Contact us now via WhatsApp or call us for fast service

footer.areas: Serving all areas of Sharjah • Dubai • Ajman
